channel.title: Welcome to Jinye's homepage
channel.description: Recent content on Welcome to Jinye's homepage

item.title: Location
item.description: Professor Dr von Igelfeld's mailing and office addresses at the Institute of Romance Philology.

item.title: Office Hours
item.description: Schedule and location for Professor Dr von Igelfeld's office hours.

item.title: Source-free Active Domain Adaptation for Diabetic Retinopathy Grading Based on Ultra-wide-field Fundus Images
item.description: This paper proposes a novel source-free active domain adaptation approach, achieving state-of-the-art performance in addressing real-world domain adaptation challenges in medical imaging. Published in Computers in Biology and Medicine, 2024.

item.title: Lightweight Wavelet-Based Transformer for Image Super-Resolution
item.description: This paper investigates a lightweight vision Transformer for signal image super-resolution and, for the first time, incorporates stationary wavelet transform into the modeling process to enhance its performance. Published in PRICAI, 2022.

item.title: List of Irregular Verbs Across Romance Languages
item.description: This dataset contains all irregular verbs in known Romance languages.

item.title: Lectures at the Villa of Reduced Circumstances
item.description: This graduate course presents classical results in Romance philology.

item.title: Portugese Irregular Verbs
item.description: This book discusses Portugese irregular verbs in great details.

item.title: Profanity in Early Irish
item.description: This undergraduate course discusses profanity in Early Irish.
